meanings.definition: Following as a result or effect.
meanings.sent1: She tripped and fell; consequent, she scraped her knee.
meanings.sent2: He missed the bus; consequent, he arrived late to work.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase; consequent, chaos ensued.
meanings.sent4: The storm passed; consequent, the sun emerged from behind the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The alarm rang; consequent, everyone woke up in a hurry.

meanings.definition: A result or effect that follows from an action or condition.
meanings.sent1: The broken window was a consequent of the baseball hitting it.
meanings.sent2: His apology was a consequent of his mistake.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing trash can was a consequent of forgetting garbage day.
meanings.sent4: The celebration was a consequent of their team winning the championship.
meanings.sent5: The traffic jam was a consequent of the road construction.
